name: Talent Recruit
description: Talent Recruit was started in 2014 by recruitment & staffing industry veterans Alok Gupta and Shalini Gupta. The company has rapidly grown over the past few years, building a highly successful business that is marked by intelligence-driven technology, automation, and analytics. We help companies manage their human capital better through several services including hiring, recruitment, onboarding, talent management, and employee engagement.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Enhancing the Recruitment Experience with Artificial Intelligence
ShortDescription: TalentRecruit is an AI-powered platform that is highly configurable & scalable with end-to-end recruitment capabilities.

Highlights.name: Virtual Recruiter
Highlights.description: ERIKA - A Virtual Assistant powered by Machine Learning algorithms, helps you find the best-matched candidates by analyzing each candidate's data point.

Highlights.name: Automated Interview Scheduler
Highlights.description: Adopt a collaborative approach towards the interview scheduling process that allows candidates, hiring managers & interview panelists to share convenient time slots with each other to eliminate recruiter intervention in the interview scheduling process.

Highlights.name: seamless recruiting experience
Highlights.description: Engage candidates easily via their mobile devices and increase engagement by improving their mobile hiring experience.

enhanced_description: Talent Recruit, launched in 2014 by recruitment and staffing industry veterans, is an AI-powered, highly configurable, and scalable platform. It offers end-to-end recruitment capabilities, leveraging intelligence-driven technology, automation, and analytics to accelerate the hiring process. The platform features ERIKA, a virtual recruiter powered by Machine Learning algorithms for best-matched candidate identification, an automated interview scheduler for collaborative scheduling, and tools for seamless mobile candidate engagement to enhance the overall hiring experience. Beyond core recruitment, Talent Recruit also supports onboarding, talent management, and employee engagement.
competitive_advantages: Machine Learning-driven candidate matching (Virtual Recruiter ERIKA)
Automated interview scheduling to reduce recruiter intervention
Seamless mobile candidate engagement for improved experience
roi_benefits: Hire top talent faster and more efficiently
Increased efficiency by eliminating recruiter intervention in interview scheduling
Improved candidate engagement and mobile hiring experience
Better quality of hire through best-matched candidate identification
